column4: How do I duplicate a linux system? Can I just TAR a system and unpack to another partition? partimage needs a same-size partition to restore to, right? ... or .. should I install base system and use dpkg --get-selections .. or ...  .. and How about Mondo, bubackup, sbackup and such ?
What about duplicating a linux system to a machine with different hardware?
look into dd    as in man dd from a terminal
nope .. dd is not a solution for me
